body_html:
The reference data types are going away, so you don't have to worry about feeding / fetching those.

The resource data type is a tensor whose elements are ResourceHandle C++ protocol buffer objects. It should not be necessary to feed or fetch these tensors; instead simply connect ops which emit resources with ops which take resources and things will work.
body_text:
The reference data types are going away, so you don't have to worry about feeding / fetching those.
The resource data type is a tensor whose elements are ResourceHandle C++ protocol buffer objects. It should not be necessary to feed or fetch these tensors; instead simply connect ops which emit resources with ops which take resources and things will work.
body:
The reference data types are going away, so you don't have to worry about feeding / fetching those.

The resource data type is a tensor whose elements are ResourceHandle C++ protocol buffer objects. It should not be necessary to feed or fetch these tensors; instead simply connect ops which emit resources with ops which take resources and things will work.
